title: GogoaT
description: An app for finding nearby houses of worship - churches, temples, etc.

title: Where do I Worship?
description: An multi-faceted source for information on public transportation in Boston. It comes in a web/mobile/PWA version and a Discord bot.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google Maps API, Google Places API

title: Tippa
description: An app to calculate how much to tip - as well as how to split the tip amongst friends.
